name: Eat Your Vegetables!
summary:
Who would have thought eating your vegetables would be so much fun?
Super simple, yet addictive game play! Can you tap and swipe? If so, you are qualified to Eat Your Vegetables.
Make sure to only eat your vegetables and avoid eating things like rocks, nails, jewelry, hair picks, pitchforks, lava lamps, alien ray guns, and anything else that flies at you!
Play with 6 unique unlockable characters, each with 3 levels of difficulty including; 1 & 1, Multiple Vegetables, and with Distractions! Make sure you keep your baby from being distracted by swiping or tapping away dogs, flies, disco music, earthquakes, asteroid fields, sudden thunderstorms, and UFO’s.
Try and beat your friend’s score on the leaderboard, or try to reach the highest score by eating all your vegetables.
